code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Rating=_ref=>{let{value}=_ref;const renderStar=index=>{const decimalPart=value-index;if(decimalPart>=0.75){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-star"},index);}else if(decimalPart>=0.25){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-star-half-alt"},index);}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"far fa-star"},index);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rating",children:Array.from({length:5},(_,index)=>renderStar(index))});};export default Rating;
